## Description
The **Deliver PEC **task allows to send certified emails via PEC (Posta Elettronica Certificata) using the LOTXML mode.

## Configuration
**![](data:image/png;base64,)**

- In the **Alias **field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.

- In the **PEC Configuration **field, enter the alias of the PEC account configuration for the DP3 account.
